verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] warned that America must avoid the immigration problems faced by Europe - as he blamed migrants on the continent for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: warned] [ARG1: that America must avoid the immigration problems faced by Europe - as he blamed migrants on the continent for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany] .
President Donald Trump has warned that America [V: must] avoid the immigration problems faced by Europe - as he blamed migrants on the continent for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany .

President Donald Trump has warned that [ARG0: America] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: avoid] [ARG1: the immigration problems faced by Europe] - [ARGM-ADV: as he blamed migrants on the continent for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany] .

President Donald Trump has warned that America must avoid [ARG1: the immigration problems] [V: faced] [ARG0: by Europe] - as he blamed migrants on the continent for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany .

President Donald Trump has warned that America must avoid the immigration problems faced by Europe - as [ARG0: he] [V: blamed] [ARG1: migrants on the continent] [ARG2: for what he described as a rise in crime in Germany] .

President Donald Trump has warned that America must avoid the immigration problems faced by Europe - as he blamed migrants on the continent for [ARG1: what] [ARG0: he] [V: described] [ARG2: as a rise in crime in Germany] .
